channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Lélio Chetot

item.title: Détecteur pour l'accès aléatoire massif entre machines avec connaissance statistique du canal en lien ascendant
item.description: I went to the French signal processing colloquium as a co-author of a paper about “Random access coding in Multiple Access Network”.

item.title: Coded random access for massive MTC under statistical channel knowledge
item.description: This paper has been presented at the IEEE SPAWC 2019 conference in Marrakech by Diane Duchemin.

item.title: Fundamental Limits in Cellular Networks with Point Process Partial Area Statistics
item.description: I presented my very first paper at the IEEE WiOpt 2019 conference in Avignon.
